sentences.en: Tell me it's true. I implore you.
sentences.cn: 告诉我那是真的，求求你。

sentences.en: We will implore both parties to stay at the negotiating table.
sentences.cn: 我们将恳求双方留在谈判桌上。

sentences.en: I implore you, for the love you bear your children, the little Tunnies, to help us, or we are lost!
sentences.cn: 我恳求你，为了你对你孩子小金枪鱼的爱，帮帮我们吧，否则我们就完了！
